sources.name: sourceNames
sources.script:
source(output(
		acctnum as string,
		fullname as string,
		phone as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceNames

transformations.name: Orig
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Orig

transformations.name: Copy
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Copy

transformations.name: LookupOrig
transformations.script:
Copy, IsThisADupe lookup(Copy@hashvalue == Grouping@hashvalue,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupOrig

transformations.name: FinalResults
transformations.script:
LookupOrig select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		PossibleDupe
	))~> FinalResults
